content.html: I’m expecting...my very own book called “Beautiful People!” We see announcements for births and weddings, but women should be able to celebrate career milestones with that same excitement. I’m OFFICIALLY halfway done writing my book, so I wanted to take an announcement photo!
content.value:
I’m expecting...my very own book called “Beautiful People!”

We see announcements for births and weddings, but women should be able to celebrate career milestones with that same excitement.

I’m OFFICIALLY halfway done writing my book, so I wanted to take an announcement photo!
